title: My special Victoria sponge
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) unsalted butter, softened', '110g (4 oz) caster sugar', '3 large eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '110g (4 oz) self raising flour', '1 pinch salt', '6 to 8 tablespoons jam', 'icing sugar, for dusting', 'Buttercream', '140g (5 oz) butter, softened', '300g (11 oz) icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
